meanings.definition: Members of the police force in Ireland.
meanings.sent1: The gardai help keep our town safe.
meanings.sent2: I saw the gardai patrolling the streets last night.
meanings.sent3: Why did the gardai arrest the comedian? He was too funny!
meanings.sent4: The gardai are the guardians of our community.
meanings.sent5: The bright uniforms of the gardai stand out in the crowd.

meanings.sent1: Have you ever needed help from the gardai?
meanings.sent2: The gardai work hard to protect the citizens.
meanings.sent3: The gardai stopped the traffic to let the ducks cross the road.
meanings.sent4: In times of trouble, the gardai are our shield.
meanings.sent5: The sound of sirens signaled the arrival of the gardai.
